we're focused on processing and

The Collector is built around a notion
of data pipelines where each data
pipeline is made up of individual
components and each component will
essentially do one thing and then emit
data
we have three classes of components
receivers our inputs into the pipeline
processors will modify the data in some
way
and exporters are the outputs from the
pipeline
the basic requirements for the pipeline
are pretty simple we need at least one
receiver at least one exporter and
exactly one data type
the receiver and exporter requirements
are probably pretty intuitive we need to
have an input and an output but the data
type requires a little more explanation
The Collector as I said supports
multiple data types but given a given

one or two
for example we have a syslog receiver

so by Framing a pipeline with a data
